dk.statsbiblioteket.util.console
Class Table

java.lang.Object
  dk.statsbiblioteket.util.console.Table

public class Table
extends java.lang.Object

A helper class to print tabular data to an Appendable, such as System.out.

          The underlying data model for a Table

Method Detail

setPrintHeaders

public void setPrintHeaders(boolean printHeaders)
Sets whether or not the column headers should be printed

Parameters:
printHeaders - if false the column headers will not be printed

setDelimiter

public void setDelimiter(java.lang.String delim)
Sets the string used as row delimiter. The default value is one whitespace. Another typical pattern is " | " which will give columns separated by vertical lines.

Parameters:
delim - the string used to delimit column data

setHeaderFormatter

public Table setHeaderFormatter(Formatter formatter)
Set a Formatter used to print the table headers

Parameters:
formatter - formatter to use on the table headers
Returns:
always returns this

print

public java.lang.Appendable print(java.lang.Appendable buf)
                           throws java.io.IOException
Print the tabular data to the designated output buffer, fx a PrintStream (like System.out) or a StringBuilder.

Parameters:
buf - the buffer to print the tabular formatted data to
Returns:
always returns buf
Throws:
java.io.IOException - on failure writing data to buf
